articles.title: DNA data and modeling reveal potential spread of invasive species - Phys.org
articles.description: Scientists at the University of Southampton have found that a marine invasive species—a sea squirt that lives on rocky shores—could spread along 3,500 kilometers of South American coastline if climate change or human activities alter sea conditions.

articles.title: American Frances Tiafoe knocks off No. 4 Stefanos Tsitsipas in Wimbledon first round - ESPN
articles.description: American Frances Tiafoe knocks off fourth-ranked Stefanos Tsitsipas in straight sets to reach the second round at Wimbledon.
articles.content:
American Frances Tiafoe pulled off the first major upset at Wimbledon 2021 on Monday as he beat world No. 4 Stefanos Tsitsipas 6-4, 6-4, 6-3 to advance to the second round.

articles.title: Billionaire boss Ivan Glasenberg makes one last coal deal in final days at Glencore - News24
articles.description: Glencore has agreed to buy stakes owned by BHP Group and Anglo American Plc in the Cerrejon thermal coal mine, giving the world’s biggest shipper of the fuel complete control of the asset.
